name: Feed the King (olimobu)
description:
Feed the King is a video game made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 34, a short but intense interactive fiction where the player has the power to feed a king of their choice.

- Code and audio: Oliver Moya Bueno
- Graphics: Antonio Zamudio Pérez
- Assistance: Esther Páez Sánchez

Enjoy our video game!
